name: Oil Sprayer for Cooking Olive Oil Sprayer Mister for Air Fryer Vegetable Vinegar Oil Portable Mini Kitchen Gadgets for Baking,Salad,Grilling,BBQ,Roasting (2)

✿ EASY TO USE - The olive oil spray bottle is very easy to use.The new design on sprayer make you feel easy to cook.The new design is portable.You will love to cook with the sprayer.

✿ WIDELY APPLICATIONS - The oil mister spray bottle have widely applications such as cooking, frying, BBQ, Baking,Making salads.It will provide you best way to control oil.You can contact with us if any problem. ZEREOOY team will respond timely.
